name: TKToken
desc: A representation of a hardware-based cryptographic token.

items.name: init(tokenDriver: TKTokenDriver, instanceID: TKToken.InstanceID)
items.desc: Initializes a token with the driver you specify.

items.name: typealias TKToken.InstanceID
items.desc: A type that represents the instance identifier of a token.

items.name: protocol TKTokenDelegate
items.desc: The interface that a token delegate implements to respond to session creation events.

items.name: var keychainContents: TKTokenKeychainContents?
items.desc: The contents of the keychain for this token.

items.name: class TKTokenKeychainContents
items.desc: A representation of the state of the keychain for a particular token.

items.name: class TKTokenKeychainItem
items.desc: An abstract base class for managing a token’s contents as keychain items.

items.name: class TKTokenKeychainCertificate
items.desc: A token’s certificate as stored in the keychain.

items.name: class TKTokenKeychainKey
items.desc: A token's key as stored in the keychain.

items.name: typealias TKToken.ObjectID
items.desc: A unique and persistent identifier of a particular token object.

items.name: var configuration: TKToken.Configuration
items.desc: The current configuration for a token.
